name: dayi-ai-broadcast
description: 大医AI导播系统 - 智能视频导播解决方案
author: 大医AI团队 <support@dayi-ai.com>

scripts.electron:build: vue-tsc -b && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:build:no-check: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --win --x64
scripts.build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac
scripts.build:win:check: vue-tsc -b && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --win --x64
scripts.build:mac:check: vue-tsc -b && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac
scripts.electron:preview: electron-builder install-app-deps && npm run electron:build && electron .
scripts.package:all: vue-tsc -b && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --config electron.vite.config.ts --mode production && npm run package:win && npm run package:mac
